titleStmt.title: The tragedie of Lodouick Sforza Duke of Millan. By Robert Gomersall
titleStmt.author: Gomersall, Robert, 1602-1646?
Cecil, Thomas, fl. 1630, engraver.

publicationStmt.date: in the yeare M DC XXVIII. [1628]

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed "Tho: Cecill. sculp.": Sforza by Rob: Gomersall. London. Printed for Iohn Marriott. 1628.
The first two leaves are blank except for signature-mark on A2.
Running title reads: The tragedy of Sforza.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
